DOC.brief_summary: The principle investigator evaluate self-reported quality vision quality life physician undergoing LASIK PRK surgery .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation LASIK PRK Surgery Physicians
DOC.detailed_description: The participant comprehensive eye examination express interest study . This include slit lamp examination front eye dilate fundoscopic examination back eye . If pathology note would exclude participant study , investigator inform participant make appropriate referral . This standard practice laser situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) surgery photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) surgery . If participant deem appropriate study comprehensive examination include computerized videokeratography , participant enrol . These exam also standard practice LASIK PRK surgery . The Quality Vision ( QoV ) Questionnaire administer follow pre-operative visit participant enrol three-month twelve-month post- op visit participant see principle investigator . The questionnaire study intervention . The participant undergo bilateral simultaneous LASIK eye surgery PRK surgery . The participant see pre-operatively , day surgery , post op day one , one month , three month , twelve-months part study . Participants may also see frequently require medical standpoint . The participant receive topical antibiotic eye one week follow procedure . LASIK treat eye receive pred forte 1 % ophthalmic drop one week four week treatment . All within usual customary standard care treatment patient undergo LASIK PRK surgery .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion . 21 year old . A physician medical student . Have ability give inform consent . Speak read English fluently . Have previously form refractive surgery , include prior LASIK cataract surgery . May benefit increase spectacle independence . Have determine good candidate LASIK procedure base investigator 's assessment medical ophthalmic health , general cognitive function , physical social limitation . Have treatment target bilateral emmetropia . Express willingness potential ability return followup examination 12month followup exam care treat investigator . Are enrol research study . Exclusion criterion . Subjects age 21 . Patients excessively thin cornea . Patients topographic evidence keratoconus . Patients ectatic eye disorder . Patients autoimmune disease . Patients pregnant nursing .
